title: Big Magic
detail: Big Magic: Creative Living Beyond Fear written by Elizabeth Gilbert. With the creation of this book, the author digs deep into her own generative process to share her wisdom and unique perspective about creativity.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

title: Save What's Left
detail: Save What’s Left by Elizabeth Castellano can best be described as the “un-beach read.” It pulls back the curtain on life in a beach town, revealing the true cost of a pretty view. Told from the candid and irreverent perspective of a newcomer turned local, this is a story of forgiveness, fortitude, and second chances.
author: Elizabeth Castellano
